Hello Eric,


I also seldomly use the Photomatix algorithm for the same reason. I had 
several talks with the Author of the software about this and i think it 
should be mentioned that the current beta version includes a new global 
operator.
The operator is especially useful for panoramic use as it will do a 
"matching" map of several images.
I used this TMO for a MDR stitch of a panorama (by Wolfgang Stich) and 
the results are very pleasing:
http://www.austria-360.at/kaernten/page-gletschermuehle.html


(Sorry for this commercial break, but i thought, it should be done 
justice to the current development of the software)


Best regards
Bernhard
